source.query:
SELECT *
FROM LRS_RAW.MASTER_DATA.TOWER_TABLE_NAMES
WHERE LOAD_TYPE = 'Full'
AND TABLE_NAME NOT IN ('SITE', 'DESTINATION', 'VEHICLE', 'TRIP', 'WORKER');

activities.name: Tower SITE Table
activities.description:
Copy activity for dbo.site table. 
Copy activity requires physical mapping of schema in the mapping tab due to data type issues.

Copy activity for Customer Payment Accounts. 
Copy activity requires physical mapping of schema in the mapping tab for security.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CUSTOMERPAYMENTACCOUNTUID
     , CUSTID
     , SITEID
     , ISDEFAULTAUTOMATICPAYMENTACCOUNT
     , CREDITCARDTYPE
     , ACCOUNTHOLDERNAME
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDNUMBER
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDSECURITYCODE
     , CREDITCARDEXPIRATIONDATE
     , NULL AS DEBITACCOUNT
     , NULL AS DEBITROUTING
     , PAYMENTACCOUNTADDRESSUID
     , ACCOUNTTYPE
     , ACTIVE
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDDESCRIPTION
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDLAST4
     , NULL AS MERCHANTPROFILEID
     , DEBITACCOUNTTYPE
     , NULL AS ACCOUNTDESCRIPTION
     , AUTOPAYMAXLIMIT
     , AUTOPAYSCOPE
     , NULL AS DEBITACCOUNTLAST4
     , NULL AS DEBITROUTINGLAST4
     , DEBITACCOUNTOWNERSHIP
     , PROCESSINGMETHOD
     , MERCHANTTOKEN
FROM CUSTOMERPAYMENTACCOUNT
